name: The Unreal Story
description:
Welcome to The Unreal Story, a FPS/TPS, Action, Adventure, RPG game. There's game mode like Campaign, and Outbreak. We might add more game modes in the future if you guys want more. Let's start how the game modes work.

The Unreal Story Campaign: (Single Player Mode Only) On Campaign Main Story, Planet X19, This world was once your home, your planet, your life. You’ve been sent to a Mysterious Ruin, your only goal is to find your way back home. As you move on from the hard decisions you’re going to face. Weird, creepy creatures are waiting for you. You fight along side with Rust, John and Shepherd, yourself included. From planet to planet, you find out who destroyed your home and to find out who you really are.
On Campaign Horror Story, there is four rooms, and the outside you need to survive in. There's the Basement, Living Room, Bedroom, Attic, and the backyard. Do all of them in order to understand the story more.

The Unreal Story Outbreak: On Outbreak, there's another story line for this mode, but you must wait for maps to come out to find out more of the story. You play as Leo, John, Aaron, and Helper to stop Leo Jr the unstoppable boss from destroying the universe. You also need to stop the Outbreakers from stopping you and other stuffs that are surrounding you. You will need to jump from universe to universe to find out how to stop this nightmare, and how it will end. The choices you make depends on you. There's game modes like Solo Game, Homebase, and other game modes that are coming soon for limited time. This game mode (Outbreak) was originally named Zombies, but since it's not an original name for our game, we decided to rename to something original for our game.

Features:
  • Campaign Main Story
  • Campaign Hombase
  • Campaign Horror Story
  • Outbreak Solo Game
  • Outbreak Hombase
  • Outbreak Tutorial
